Text: RE TNPCI really dont think this is the direction I want to head in but as always thanks for the support Im looking for a treasury risk control position and Im speaking with a number of regional power cos and consulting orgs Do you know the people at The New Power Company in CT Ronney Original Message From mailto Sent Friday August AM To elcooilgascom Subject RE Belfer Comment Hi Ronney I just spoke to Joe and the only thing he is looking to add in NY is a more junior person to cover the hedge funds If you are interested in that hed love to talk to you Im not sure how much help that is Have a great weekend Jeff Original Message From Ronney Rosenberg elcooilgascomENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESRonneyRosenbergCRRosenbergBelcooilgasEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday August PM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject FW Belfer Comment Jeffrey Subject Belfer Comment Bob came into my office today Black Monday and mentioned that he saw youliked your presentationput a good word in for mewith you You must have made a possitive impression cause hes been in his office incommunicato all dayand our conversation about you cheered him up Told him A You mentioned you were looking forward to making your board presentation B Belco I bought Enron You lunch last week C You suggested I speak wJoe Gold at MG here he even joked that a more appropriate name would be Joe NonFerrous Anyway thanks again for taking the time last week to chat If you need to get away per the Southwest Airlines advertWeve got a bucolic place in the Berkshires youre welcome to visit Ronney This email is the property of Enron Corp FW Belfer CommentJeffrey Subject Belfer Comment Bob came into my office today Black Monday and mentioned that he saw youliked your presentationput a good word in for mewith you You must have made a possitive impression cause hes been in his office incommunicato all dayand our conversation about you cheered him up Told him A You mentioned you were looking forward to making your board presentation B Belco I bought Enron You lunch last week C You suggested I speak wJoe Gold at MG here he even joked that a more appropriate name would be Joe NonFerrous Anyway thanks again for taking the time last week to chat If you need to get away per the Southwest Airlines advertWeve got a bucolic place in the Berkshires youre welcome to visit Ronney

Misc MGJeffrey Thanks for taking the time to step out into the heat to dine with me As always it was a pleasure catching up ever so briefly Per our discussion my postBelco career move will most likely be to a a Financial Control post in an energy company b RiskFinancial Control consulting or c tbd other intellectually challenging position Ive attached my resume for you to send on to Joe Gold at MG if hes interested in adding staff to his NY operation If hes not interested its okay I appreciate your thoughts support anyway On another noteplease make some quality time for me and my husband next time your in Manhattan If you give us some notice well book a great dinner spot In the meantime I hope the summer associate party was enjoyablenext time I suggest renting a fun public venueor hire a professional caterer Stay happy healthy and dont sweat the little things Ronney RLRresumedoc RLRresumedoc
